name: New Recent Posts Select Categories By Thao Marky
author: Thao Marky

sections.description:
Display Recent Posts on Your Website with thumbnail images of the content. You can select to display posts from all categories or a specific one. Additionally, you have the option to choose the position of the thumbnail image, allowing you to display it either on the left or right side of the title.

After activating the plugin, go to Appearance => Widgets, find “Recent Posts Select Categories,” and drag it to your desired position.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
v1.1 – Update
– Updated to the latest version, ensuring compatibility with the current WordPress version.
– Fixed existing bugs from the previous version that caused compatibility issues.
– Thumbnail images and titles are now automatically adjusted based on the widget size.
– Added new feature: option to display the thumbnail image on the left or right.
– Introduced a new feature: option to display either the latest posts or random posts.
– Removed the option to limit the excerpt display.
– Removed the “Read More” functionality.
